text: aur unake nabee ne unase kaha ki beshak khuda ne tumhaaree darakhvaast ke (mutaabiq taaloot ko tumhaara baadashaah muqarrar kiya (tab) kahane lage us kee hukoomat ham par kyon kar ho sakatee hai haalaaki saltanat ke haqadaar usase jyaada to ham hain kyonki use to maal ke etabaar se bhee faaragul baalee (khushahaalee) tak naseeb nahin (nabee ne) kaha khuda ne use tum par phazeelat dee hai aur maal mein na sahee magar ilm aur jism ka phailaav to us ka khuda ne jyaada pharamaaya he aur khuda apana mulk jise chaahen de aur khuda badee gunjaish vaala aur vaaqifakaar hai
